name: EthernetHook
author: tcpassos
description: Monitor ethernet interface, emit connect/disconnect events, run payloads, draw icon

interface.label: Ethernet Interface
interface.description: Interface name to monitor (edit JSON to change)

show_status_icon.label: Show Ethernet Icon
show_status_icon.description: Display icon when Ethernet has IP

icon_horizontal_pos.label: Icon Horizontal Pos
icon_horizontal_pos.description: Horizontal x coordinate (pixels) for Ethernet icon (0 = left)

on_ethernet_disconnected.label: Payloads On Disconnect
